Reviews.Title: perfect laptop
Reviews.Author: velvetsky
Reviews.Content: bought this laptop a couple of days ago, it is just as other Alienwares... I mean, they are heavy, with amazing lights and perfect for games... the only thing I'm not satisfied is that C disc can't be divided, which really annoys me a lot...

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I paid for and more
Reviews.Author: Gregory Miller
Reviews.Content: Computer was fast responsive and very compact.  Weight was a little on the heavy side but I expected that since it is basically a mini gaming laptop.  Speakers are very loud and crisp. And love the customizable backlit keyboard.  Overall a very nice machine.Very small and portable. Can throw it in my backpack and not even notice its thereDefinitely an upgrade from my old 17in behemoth gaming laptop.

Reviews.Title: unpleasant experiences
Reviews.Author: yueling du
Reviews.Content: Three month ago, I bought a dell Alienware in Amazon. A week ago, Dell help me to fix the screen problem, but the mechanic told me it lost some screws and it maybe a used one. Today I find the lift speaker didn`t work. I don`t think a new labtop have those problems in three month. It make me so disappointed with amazon.

Reviews.Title: This Alienware has problem when I get it for two days
Reviews.Author: Donghang Li
Reviews.Content: the Alienware hsa problem with its lights, it sometimes only work half of them and the indicator light doesn't work as same as the other lights, I don't konw if this is the hardware problem or the software problem, I'm so annoyed with this, and I don't have time to repair it, I don't know why does the new laptop has such as this problem, is this new laptop? I'm so doubt it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel i7-4700MQ 2.4 GHz
8 GB DIMM
750 GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive
14-Inch Screen, 1GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Alienware ALW14-1869sLV 14-Inch Laptop (Silver)
